revised_title: John Arthur Shercliff: A Pioneering Engineer and Mathematician
tldr: John Arthur Shercliff was a renowned engineer and mathematician who made significant contributions to the field of magnetohydrodynamics, particularly in liquid metal magnetohydrodynamics. He also played a crucial role in the development of electromagnetic flowmeters, which are used to measure the flow of fluids in various applications, including ocean currents and blood flow in human arteries. Shercliff's work in these areas has had a lasting impact on engineering and science.
